name: Over Color - A Simple Free Puzzle Game
name_original: Over Color - A Simple Free Puzzle Game
description:
A very simple color game. Easy to start, hard to master.

Features:
- Simple rules
- Difficult to master
- Colorful design.

How to Play:
- Move the blocks into the best position to merge blocks and clear rows.
- Place two blocks of the same block to combine them into a single block of a deeper color.
- Create a row of blocks with same color to clear the row.
- Don't make your blocks hit the top.
